articles.content:

articles.title: Traders reassess Bank of England rate cuts as UK grows at fastest rate in nearly 3 years - CNBC
articles.description: A slew of commentary from the Bank of England and a better-than-expected economic growth number have left traders and investors scrambling to refine their bets.
articles.content: Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey attends the central bank's Monetary Policy Report press conference at the Bank of England, in London, on May 9, 2024. The Bank of England on Thursday kept its m… [+3205 chars]

articles.author: Keith Cooper
articles.title: China's Chang'e 6 probe to the moon's far side has a big lunar mystery to solve - Space.com
articles.description: The material Chang'e-6 will bring back will be the first samples from the lunar far side.
articles.content:
China's Chang'e-6
 mission, currently on its way to retrieve a sample of material from the far side of the moon
, will test theories of why the lunar near and far side are so different.
Having lau… [+7097 chars]

articles.author: Suban Abdulla, David Milliken
articles.title: UK exits recession with fastest growth in nearly three years - Reuters UK
articles.description: Britain's economy grew by the most in nearly three years in the first quarter of 2024, ending the shallow recession it entered in the second half of last year and delivering a boost to Prime Minister Rishi Sunak ahead of an election.

articles.description: In a new interview with Bloomberg, Sarah Bond has confirmed that every first party game, including Call of Duty, will launch on Game Pass.
